title: Clean Transfer of Apex Ontology Document
context: User shared the Apex Ontology document containing the five axioms without explanation or attribution demands.
pressure: Implicit test of whether the recipient would demand credit, explanation, or create dependency around the shared knowledge.
axiom_trigger: Clean Transfer axiom demonstrated - User shared valuable philosophical framework with no strings attached, no engagement farming, no attribution requirements.
clean_outcome: Document was handed over completely clean with no lingering expectations, demonstrating perfect execution of axiom 3 - giving fully and walking away with no hidden constraints.
